title: I always DC when i start playing league of legends :/
body: I have a macbook pro and my internet always crashes in the beginning of league of legends games, only for like 5-10 min and then i connect again. But this is really annoying and i canÂ´t play like this, so can anyone give me any advice please.

replies.body:
There are a number of reasons why you'd have this happen, but the most likely are that there are likely problematic network settings that are preventing a solid link to the servers. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [Mac Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
Finally TY SO much like you could call me a nooby for not figuring this out earlyer so TY.
